S01kbavk10u:8: yasyātyantaṃ cirapariṇater naiva niryāti rāgaḥ // KAvk_10.2 //
S01kbavk10u:9: puṃsaḥ śukraṃ vigalitadhṛter ārtavaṃ yoṣitaś ca
S01kbavk10u:11: ekībhūtaṃ vrajati niyamāt kasya cid bījabhāvaṃ
S01kbavk10u:12: yo 'ntas tasmin bhavati sahasā saṃnikāṣe yathāgniḥ // KAvk_10.3 //
S01kbavk10u:14: puṣpāmodas tilaṃ iva śanaiḥ kāñcanaṃ vāgnitāpaḥ /
S01kbavk10u:15: so 'yaṃ garbhaṃ viśati niyatair apy asaṃlakṣyavṛttir
S01kbavk10u:16: vāyur gandhair iva bahuvidhaiḥ karmabhir vāsyamānaḥ // KAvk_10.4 //
S01kbavk10u:19: kaṃ cit kālaṃ vahati vikṛtiṃ nirvikārāyamāno
S01kbavk10u:20: māyūrāṇḍe jalamaya iva vyaktabhaktir mayūraḥ // KAvk_10.5 //
S01kbavk10u:24: kleśaṃ bhuṅkte kim api viṣamaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāprapannaḥ // KAvk_10.6 //
S01kbavk10u:25: kāle vṛntāt svayaṃ iva phalaṃ vicyutaṃ karmapākāt
S01kbavk10u:28: niryāty antaḥ śara iva dhanuryantraṇair yantramuktaḥ // KAvk_10.7 //
S01kbavk10u:30: stanyaṃ mātuḥ pibati yad asau naiva karṇena nākṣṇā /
S01kbavk10u:41: kaṃ bobrūte viṣamavipadām āspadatvaṃ prayātaḥ // KAvk_10.10 //
S01kbavk10u:48: janmāvartaṃ nijaṃ iva likhan dīrghaṃ oṃkāram ādau
S01kbavk10u:49: varge varge vitarati matiṃ bhogasarge niviṣṭaḥ // KAvk_10.12 //
S01kbavk10u:51: kāmautsukyāt punar api pare yauvane naṣṭasaṃjñaḥ /
S01kbavk10u:53: badhnāty āsthāṃ sthirataradhiyā yoṣitāṃ vibhrameṣu // KAvk_10.13 //
S01kbavk10u:54: vāci śrotraṃ vapur api calāliṅganeṣv aṅganānāṃ
S01kbavk10u:56: pātre kurvan dṛśam api mukhe suptasarvakriyo 'sau
S01kbavk10u:71: prāptaṃ nāsmin vapuṣi sukṛtaṃ naiva dattaṃ na bhuktaṃ /
S01kbavk10u:72: itthaṃ caurair iva sa muṣitaś cintayaty eva duḥkhāt
S01kbavk10u:77: rājyabhraṃśe nṛpa iva sukhaṃ so 'tha śocaty atītaṃ // KAvk_10.19 //
S01kbavk10u:78: āyur nītaṃ na ca samucitaṃ yācakāyopanītaṃ
S01kbavk10u:79: nāpy unnītaṃ diśi diśi yaśaḥ satpathaṃ na pratītaṃ
S01kbavk10u:81: bhītaṃ pāpāt kim api na mayā yat tad eva praṇītaṃ // KAvk_10.20 //
S01kbavk10u:85: śuṣkaṃ śītaṃ tarum iva vane vānaraṃ māṃ vadanti // KAvk_10.21 //
S01kbavk10u:86: so 'yaṃ kāyaḥ śrayati vilayaṃ naiva māyānikāyaḥ
S01kbavk10u:87: srastāḥ sarve daśanamaṇayas te ca keśāḥ na doṣāḥ /
S01kbavk10u:93: śakticchedād ṛṇaṃ iva mahat prāptakālo daridraḥ // KAvk_10.23 //
S01kbavk10u:94: bhūmiṃ gehaṃ vasu parijanaṃ putradārādi cānyat
S01kbavk10u:96: yāvaj janmany api punar asau snehamohānubandhais
S01kbavk10u:97: tais tair antaḥ kṛtaparicayas tanmayībhāvam eti // KAvk_10.24 //
S01kbavk10u:100: yad vā puṇyakalārjitaṃ sukhapadaṃ tat saṃkṣaye duḥkhadaṃ
S01kbavk10u:104: / iti kṣemendraviracitāyāṃ bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyāṃ garbhāvakrāntinirdeśo nāma daśamaḥ pallavaḥ /
